snippet.title: Woman charged over Toowoomba shooting
snippet.content: Police have charged a second person with attempting to murder a man who was shot in the stomach and leg in the Queensland city of Toowoomba. The 26-year-old woman will face court on Tuesday, charged over the gun attack on the 20-year-old man outside a Curzon Street property on July 10. A 23-year-old man was charged with attempted murder and other offences the day after the shooting. (C) AAP 2017
